sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again

minecraft:entity.title: behavior.entity
minecraft:entity.description:
JSON schema for data-driven entities
See https://bedrock.dev/docs/stable/Entities

identifier.description: Sets the name for this entity's description.

is_spawnable.description: Sets whether or not this entity has a spawn egg in the creative ui.

is_summonable.description: Sets whether or not we can summon this entity using commands such as /summon.

runtime_identifier.description: Sets the name for the Vanilla Minecraft identifier this entity will use to build itself from.

animations.description: Sets the mapping of internal animation references to actual animations. This is a JSON Object of name/animation pairs

additionalProperties.description: Internal (to the entity) name of this animation entry

scripts.description: Sets the mapping of internal animation controller references to actual animation controller. This is a JSON Array of name/animation-controller pairs

items.description: Internal (to the entity) name of this animation entry

minecraft:game_event_movement_tracking.description: Allows an entity to emit `entityMove`, `swim` and `flap` game events, depending on the block the entity is moving through. It is added by default to every mob. Add it again to override its behavior.

emit_flap.description: If true, the `flap` game event will be emitted when the entity moves through air.

emit_move.description: If true, the `entityMove` game event will be emitted when the entity moves on ground or through a solid.

emit_swim.description: If true, the `swim` game event will be emitted when the entity moves through a liquid.

value.description: undocumented

minecraft:variable_max_auto_step.description: Entities with this component will have a maximum auto step height that is different depending on whether they are on a block that prevents jumping. Incompatible with "runtime_identifier": "minecraft:horse".

base_value.description: The maximum auto step height when on any other block.

controlled_value.description: The maximum auto step height when on any other block and controlled by the player.

jump_prevented_value.description: The maximum auto step height when on a block that prevents jumping.

minecraft:exhaustion_values.description: Defines how much exhaustion each player action should take.

attack.description: Amount of exhaustion applied when attacking.

damage.description: Amount of exhaustion applied when taking damage.

heal.description: Amount of exhaustion applied when healed through food regeneration.

jump.description: Amount of exhaustion applied when healed through food regeneration.

mine.description: Amount of exhaustion applied when mining.

sprint.description: Amount of exhaustion applied when sprinting.

sprint_jump.description: Amount of exhaustion applied when sprint jumping.

swim.description: Amount of exhaustion applied when swimming.

walk.description: Amount of exhaustion applied when walking.

minecraft:movement_sound_distance_offset.description: Sets the offset used to determine the next step distance for playing a movement sound.

value.description: The higher the number, the less often the movement sound will be played.

minecraft:vibration_damper.description: Vibrations emitted by this entity will be ignored.

minecraft:suspect_tracking.description: Allows this entity to remember suspicious locations

interval.description: A Molang expression defining the inter-beat interval in seconds. A value of zero or less means no heartbeat.

sound_event.description: Level sound event to be played as the heartbeat sound.

minecraft:anger_level.description: Allows this entity to track anger towards a set of nuisances

anger_decrement_interval.description: Anger level will decay over time. Defines how often anger towards all nuisances will be decreased by one

angry_boost.description: Anger boost applied to angry threshold when mob gets angry

angry_threshold.description: Threshold that define when the mob is considered angry at a nuisance

default_annoyingness.description: The default amount of annoyingness for any given nuisance. Specifies how much to raise anger level on each provocation

max_anger.description: The maximum anger level that can be reached. Applies to any nuisance

nuisance_filter.description: Filter that is applied to determine if a mob can be a nuisance

on_increase_sounds.description: Sounds to play when the entity is getting provoked. Evaluated in order. First matching condition wins

condition.description: A Molang expression describing under which conditions to play this sound, given that the entity was provoked

remove_targets_below_angry_threshold.description: Defines if the mob should remove target if it falls below 'angry' threshold

value.description: The current amount of health the entity has

max.description: The max amount of health the mob has

minecraft:knockback_resistance.description: How much resistance the entity has agenst knockback

value.description: Amount of knockback resistance

minecraft:attack.title: ATTRIBUTES
minecraft:attack.description: Defines an entity's melee attack and any additional effects on it.

damage.description: Range of the random amount of damage the melee attack deals. A negative value can heal the entity instead of hurting it

effect_duration.description: Duration in seconds of the status ailment applied to the damaged entity

effect_name.description: Identifier of the status ailment to apply to an entity attacked by this entity's melee attack

minecraft:spell_effects.title: ATTRIBUTES
minecraft:spell_effects.description: Defines what mob effects to add and remove to the entity when adding this component.

add_effects.description: List of effects to add to this entity after adding this component

effect.description: Effect to add to this entity. Includes 'duration' in seconds, 'amplifier' level, 'ambient' if it is to be considered an ambient effect, and 'visible' if the effect should be visible

remove_effects.description: List of identifiers of effects to be removed from this entity after adding this component

minecraft:strength.title: ATTRIBUTES
minecraft:strength.description: Defines the entity's strength to carry items.

max.description: The maximum strength of this entity

value.description: The initial value of the strength

minecraft:addrider.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:addrider.description: Adds a rider to the entity. Requires minecraft:rideable.

entity_type.description: The entity type that will be riding this entity.

spawn_event.description: The spawn event that will be used when the riding entity is created.

minecraft:admire_item.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:admire_item.description: Causes the mob to ignore attackable targets for a given duration.

cooldown_after_being_attacked.description: Duration, in seconds, for which mob won't admire items if it was hurt

duration.description: Duration, in seconds, that the mob is pacified.

minecraft:annotation.break_door.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:annotation.break_door.description: Allows the actor to break doors assuming that that flags set up for the component to use in navigation

break_time.description: he time in seconds required to break through doors.

min_difficulty.description: The minimum difficulty that the world must be on for this entity to break doors.

minecraft:annotation.open_door.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:annotation.open_door.description: Allows the actor to open doors assuming that that flags set up for the component to use in navigation

minecraft:area_attack.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:area_attack.description: A component that does damage to entities that get within range.

cause.description: The type of damage that is applied to entities that enter the damage range.

damage_per_tick.description: How much damage per tick is applied to entities that enter the damage range.

damage_range.description: How close a hostile entity must be to have the damage applied.

entity_filter.description: The set of entities that are valid to apply the damage to when within range.

minecraft:attack_cooldown.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:attack_cooldown.description: Adds a cooldown to a mob. The intention of this cooldown is to be used to prevent the mob from attempting to aquire new attack targets.

attack_cooldown_complete_event.description: Event to be runned when the cooldown is complete.

attack_cooldown_time.description: Amount of time in seconds for the cooldown. Can be specified as a number or a pair of numbers (min and max).

minecraft:barter.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:barter.description: Enables the component to drop an item as a barter exchange.

barter_table.description: Loot table that's used to drop a random item.

cooldown_after_being_attacked.description: Duration, in seconds, for which mob won't barter items if it was hurt

minecraft:block_climber.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:block_climber.description: Allows the player to detect and maneuver on the scaffolding block.

minecraft:dash.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:dash.description: Ability for a rideable entity to dash.

cooldown_time.description: The dash cooldown in seconds. Default value is 1.000000.

minecraft:block_sensor.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:block_sensor.description: Fires off a specified event when a block in the block list is broken within the sensor range.

on_break.description: List of blocks to watch for being broken to fire off a specified event. If a block is in multiple lists, multiple events will fire.

on_block_broken.description: Event to run when a block has been broken

sensor_radius.description: The maximum radial distance in which a specified block can be detected. The biggest radius is 32.0.

sources.description: List of sources that break the block to listen for. If none are specified, all block breaks will be detected.

minecraft:boostable.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:boostable.description: Defines the conditions and behavior of a rideable entity's boost.

boost_items.description: List of items that can be used to boost while riding this entity.

damage.description: This is the damage that the item will take each time it is used.

item.description: Name of the item that can be used to boost.

replace_item.description: The item used to boost will become this item once it is used up.

duration.description: Time in seconds for the boost.

speed_multiplier.description: Factor by which the entity's normal speed increases. E.g. 2.0 means go twice as fast.

minecraft:boss.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:boss.description: The current state of the boss for updating the boss HUD.

hud_range.description: The max distance from the boss at which the boss's health bar is present on the players screen.

name.description: The name that will be displayed above the boss's health bar.

should_darken_sky.description: Whether the sky should darken in the presence of the boss.

minecraft:break_blocks.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:break_blocks.description: Specifies the blocks that this entity can break as it moves around.

breakable_blocks.description: A list of the blocks that can be broken as this entity moves around

minecraft:breathable.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:breathable.description: Defines what blocks this entity can breathe in and gives them the ability to suffocate.

breathe_blocks.description: List of blocks this entity can breathe in, in addition to the other "breathes" parameters.

breathes_air.description: If true, this entity can breathe in air.

breathes_lava.description: If true, this entity can breathe in lava.

breathes_solids.description: If true, this entity can breathe in solid blocks.

breathes_water.description: If true, this entity can breathe in water.

generates_bubbles.description: If true, this entity will have visible bubbles while in water.

inhale_time.description: Time in seconds to recover breath to maximum.

non_breathe_blocks.description: List of blocks this entity can't breathe in, in addition to the other "breathes" parameters.

suffocate_time.description: Time in seconds between suffocation damage.

total_supply.description: Time in seconds the entity can hold its breath.

minecraft:breedable.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:breedable.description: Defines the way an entity can get into the 'love' state.

allow_sitting.description: If true, entities can breed while sitting

blend_attributes.description: If true, the entities will blend their attributes in the offspring after they breed. For example, horses blend their health, movement, and jump_strength in their offspring.

breed_cooldown.description: Time in seconds before the Entity can breed again.

breed_items.description: The list of items that can be used to get the entity into the 'love' state

breeds_with.description: The list of entity definitions that this entity can breed with.

baby_type.description: The entity definition of this entity's babies.

breed_event.description: Event to run when this entity breeds.

mate_type.description: The entity definition of this entity's mate.

causes_pregnancy.description: If true, the entity will become pregnant instead of spawning a baby.

deny_parents_variant.description: Determines how likely the baby of parents with the same variant will deny that variant and take a random variant within the given range instead.

chance.description: The percentage chance of denying the parents' variant.

max_variant.description: The inclusive maximum of the variant range.

min_variant.description: The inclusive minimum of the variant range.

environment_requirements.description: The list of nearby block requirements to get the entity into the 'love' state.

blocks.description: The block types required nearby for the entity to breed.

count.description: The number of the required block types nearby for the entity to breed.

radius.description: How many blocks radius from the mob's center to search in for the required blocks. Bounded between 0 and 16.

extra_baby_chance.description: Chance that up to 16 babies will spawn between 0.0 and 1.0, where 1.0 is 100%.

inherit_tamed.description: If true, the babies will be automatically tamed if its parents are

love_filters.description: The filters to run when attempting to fall in love.

mutation_factor.description: Determines how likely the babies are to NOT inherit one of their parent's variances. Values are between 0.0 and 1.0, with a higher number meaning more likely to mutate.

color.description: The percentage chance of a mutation on the entity's color.

extra_variant.description: The percentage chance of a mutation on the entity's extra variant type.

variant.description: The percentage chance of a mutation on the entity's variant type.

require_full_health.description: If true, the entity needs to be at full health before it can breed.

require_tame.description: If true, the entities need to be tamed first before they can breed.

transform_to_item.description: The breed item used will transform to this item upon successful interaction. Format: itemName:auxValue

minecraft:bribeable.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:bribeable.description: Defines the way an entity can get into the 'bribed' state. Animation: `query.is_bribed`

bribe_cooldown.description: Time in seconds before the Entity can be bribed again.

bribe_items.description: The list of items that can be used to bribe the entity.

minecraft:buoyant.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:buoyant.description: Enables an entity to float on the specified liquid blocks.

apply_gravity.description: Applies gravity each tick. Causes more of a wave simulation, but will cause more gravity to be applied outside liquids.

base_buoyancy.description: Base buoyancy used to calculate how much will a mob float.

big_wave_probability.description: Probability for a big wave hitting the entity. Only used if `simulate_waves` is true.

big_wave_speed.description: Multiplier for the speed to make a big wave. Triggered depending on 'big_wave_probability'.

drag_down_on_buoyancy_removed.description: How much an actor will be dragged down when the Buoyancy Component is removed.

liquid_blocks.description: List of blocks this entity can float on. Must be a liquid block.

simulate_waves.description: Should the movement simulate waves going through.

minecraft:burns_in_daylight.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:burns_in_daylight.description: Specifies if/how a mob burns in daylight.

broadcast.description: If true, celebration will be broadcasted to other entities in the radius.

celeberation_targets.description: The list of conditions that target of hunt must satisfy to initiate celebration.

celebrate_sound.description: The sound event to play when the mob is celebrating

radius.description: If broadcast is enabled, specifies the radius in which it will notify other entities for celebration.

sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again

minecraft:combat_regeneration.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:combat_regeneration.description: Gives Regeneration I and removes Mining Fatigue from the mob that kills the Actor's attack target.

apply_to_family.description: Determines if the mob will grant mobs of the same type combat buffs if they kill the target.

apply_to_self.description: Determines if the mob will grant itself the combat buffs if it kills the target.

regeneration_duration.description: The duration in seconds of Regeneration I added to the mob.

minecraft:conditional_bandwidth_optimiza.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:conditional_bandwidth_optimiza.description: Defines the Conditional Spatial Update Bandwidth Optimizations of this entity.

conditional_values.description: The object containing the conditional bandwidth optimization values.
Conditions that must be met for these optimization values to be used.

max_dropped_ticks.description: In relation to the optimization value, determines the maximum ticks spatial update packets can be not sent.

max_optimized_distance.description: The maximum distance considered during bandwidth optimizations. Any value below the max is interpolated to find optimization, and any value greater than or equal to this max results in max optimization.

use_motion_prediction_hints.description: When set to true, smaller motion packets will be sent during drop packet intervals, resulting in the same amount of packets being sent as without optimizations but with much less data being sent. This should be used when actors are travelling very quickly or teleporting to prevent visual oddities.

default_values.description: The object containing the default bandwidth optimization values.

max_dropped_ticks.description: In relation to the optimization value, determines the maximum ticks spatial update packets can be not sent.

max_optimized_distance.description: The maximum distance considered during bandwidth optimizations. Any value below the max is interpolated to find optimization, and any value greater than or equal to this max results in max optimization.

use_motion_prediction_hints.description: When set to true, smaller motion packets will be sent during drop packet intervals, resulting in the same amount of packets being sent as without optimizations but with much less data being sent. This should be used when actors are travelling very quickly or teleporting to prevent visual oddities.

minecraft:custom_hit_test.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:custom_hit_test.description: List of hitboxes for melee and ranged hits against the entity.

minecraft:damage_over_time.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:damage_over_time.description: Applies defined amount of damage to the entity at specified intervals.

damage_per_hurt.description: Amount of damage caused each hurt.

minecraft:damage_sensor.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:damage_sensor.description: Defines what events to call when this entity is damaged by specific entities or items.

triggers.description: List of triggers with the events to call when taking specific kinds of damage.

cause.description: Type of damage that triggers the events.

damage_modifier.description: A modifier that adds to/removes from the base damage from the damage cause. It does not reduce damage to less than 0.

damage_multiplier.description: A multiplier that modifies the base damage from the damage cause. If deals_damage is true the multiplier can only reduce the damage the entity will take to a minimum of 1.

deals_damage.description: If true, the damage dealt to the entity will take away health from it, set to false to make the entity ignore that damage.

on_damage.description: Specifies filters for entity definitions and events.

on_damage_sound_event.description: Defines what sound to play, if any, when the on_damage filters are met.

minecraft:despawn.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:despawn.description: Despawns the Actor when the despawn rules or optional filters evaluate to true.

despawn_from_chance.description: Determines if "min_range_random_chance" is used in the standard despawn rules

despawn_from_distance.description: Specifies if the "min_distance" and "max_distance" are used in the standard despawn rules.

max_distance.description: maximum distance for standard despawn rules to instantly despawn the mob.

min_distance.description: minimum distance for standard despawn rules to try to despawn the mob.

despawn_from_inactivity.description: Determines if the "min_range_inactivity_timer" is used in the standard despawn rules.

despawn_from_simulation_edge.description: Determines if the mob is instantly despawned at the edge of simulation distance in the standard despawn rules.

filters.description: The list of conditions that must be satisfied before the Actor is despawned. If a filter is defined then standard despawn rules are ignored.

min_range_inactivity_timer.description: The amount of time in seconds that the mob must be inactive.

min_range_random_chance.description: A random chance between 1 and the given value.

remove_child_entities.description: If true, all entities linked to this entity in a child relationship (eg. leashed) will also be despawned.

minecraft:drying_out_timer.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:drying_out_timer.description: Adds a timer for drying out that will count down and fire 'dried_out_event' or will stop as soon as the entity will get under rain or water and fire 'stopped_drying_out_event'

dried_out_event.description: Event to fire when the drying out time runs out.

recover_after_dried_out_event.description: Event to fire when entity was already dried out but received increase in water supply.

stopped_drying_out_event.description: Event to fire when entity stopped drying out, for example got into water or under rain.

total_time.description: Amount of time in seconds to dry out fully.

water_bottle_refill_time.description: Optional amount of additional time in seconds given by using splash water bottle on entity.

minecraft:economy_trade_table.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:economy_trade_table.description: Defines this entity's ability to trade with players.

convert_trades_economy.description: Determines when the mob transforms, if the trades should be converted when the new mob has a economy_trade_table. When the trades are converted, the mob will generate a new trade list with their new trade table, but then it will try to convert any of the same trades over to have the same enchantments and user data. For example, if the original has a Emerald to Enchanted Iron Sword (Sharpness 1), and the new trade also has an Emerald for Enchanted Iron Sword, then the enchantment will be Sharpness 1.

cured_discount.description: How much should the discount be modified by when the player has cured the Zombie Villager. Can be specified as a pair of numbers (low-tier trade discount and high-tier trade discount)

display_name.description: Name to be displayed while trading with this entity

hero_demand_discount.description: Used in legacy prices to determine how much should Demand be modified by when the player has the Hero of the Village mob effect

max_cured_discount.description: The max the discount can be modified by when the player has cured the Zombie Villager. Can be specified as a pair of numbers (low-tier trade discount and high-tier trade discount)

max_nearby_cured_discount.description: The max the discount can be modified by when the player has cured a nearby Zombie Villager

nearby_cured_discount.description: How much should the discount be modified by when the player has cured a nearby Zombie Villager

new_screen.description: Used to determine if trading with entity opens the new trade screen

persist_trades.description: Determines if the trades should persist when the mob transforms. This makes it so that the next time the mob is transformed to something with a trade_table or economy_trade_table, then it keeps their trades.

show_trade_screen.description: Show an in game trade screen when interacting with the mob.

table.description: File path relative to the resource pack root for this entity's trades

use_legacy_price_formula.description: Determines whether the legacy formula is used to determines the trade prices.

minecraft:entity_sensor.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:entity_sensor.description: A component that fires an event when a set of conditions are met by other entities within the defined range.

event.description: Event to fire when the conditions are met.

event_filters.description: The set of conditions that must be satisfied to fire the event.

maximum_count.description: The maximum number of entities that must pass the filter conditions for the event to send.

minimum_count.description: The minimum number of entities that must pass the filter conditions for the event to send.

relative_range.description: If true the sensor range is additive on top of the entity's size.

require_all.description: If true requires all nearby entities to pass the filter conditions for the event to send.

sensor_range.description: The maximum distance another entity can be from this and have the filters checked against it.

minecraft:environment_sensor.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:environment_sensor.description: Creates a trigger based on environment conditions.

triggers.description: The list of triggers that fire when the environment conditions match the given filter criteria.

filters.description: The filder

minecraft:equip_item.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:equip_item.description: The entity puts on the desired equipment.

minecraft:equippable.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:equippable.description: Defines an entity's behavior for having items equipped to it.

slots.description: List of slots and the item that can be equipped.

accepted_items.description: The list of items that can go in this slot.

interact_text.description: Text to be displayed when the entity can be equipped with this item when playing with Touch-screen controls.

item.description: Identifier of the item that can be equipped for this slot.

on_equip.description: Event to trigger when this entity is equipped with this item.

on_unequip.description: Event to trigger when this item is removed from this entity.

slot.description: The slot number of this slot.

on_bred.description: A Molang expression defining the amount of experience rewarded when this entity is successfully bred. An array of expressions adds each expression's result together for a final total.

on_death.description: A Molang expression defining the amount of experience rewarded when this entity dies. An array of expressions adds each expression's result together for a final total.

breaks_blocks.description: If true, the explosion will destroy blocks in the explosion radius.

causes_fire.description: If true, blocks in the explosion radius will be set on fire.

destroy_affected_by_griefing.description: If true, whether the explosion breaks blocks is affected by the mob griefing game rule.

fire_affected_by_griefing.description: If true, whether the explosion causes fire is affected by the mob griefing game rule.

fuse_length.description: The range for the random amount of time the fuse will be lit before exploding, a negative value means the explosion will be immediate.

fuse_lit.description: If true, the fuse is already lit when this component is added to the entity.

max_resistance.description: A blocks explosion resistance will be capped at this value when an explosion occurs.

power.description: The radius of the explosion in blocks and the amount of damage the explosion deals.

minecraft:flocking.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:flocking.description: Allows entities to flock in groups in water or not.

block_distance.description: The amount of blocks away the entity will look at to push away from.

block_weight.description: The weight of the push back away from blocks.

breach_influence.description: The amount of push back given to a flocker that breaches out of the water.

cohesion_threshold.description: The threshold in which to start applying cohesion.

cohesion_weight.description: The weight applied for the cohesion steering of the flock.

goal_weight.description: The weight on which to apply on the goal output.

high_flock_limit.description: Determines the high bound amount of entities that can be allowed in the flock.

in_water.description: Tells the Flocking Component if the entity exists in water.

influence_radius.description: The area around the entity that allows others to be added to the flock.

innner_cohesion_threshold.description: The distance in which the flocker will stop applying cohesion.

loner_chance.description: The percentage chance between 0-1 that a fish will spawn and not want to join flocks. Invalid values will be capped at the end points.

low_flock_limit.description: Determines the low bound amount of entities that can be allowed in the flock.

match_variants.description: Tells the flockers that they can only match similar entities that also match the variant, mark variants, and color data of the other potential flockers.

max_height.description: The max height allowable in the air or water.

min_height.description: The min height allowable in the air or water.

separation_threshold.description: The distance that is determined to be to close to another flocking and to start applying separation.

separation_weight.description: The weight applied to the separation of the flock.

use_center_of_mass.description: Tells the flockers that they will follow flocks based on the center of mass.

minecraft:genetics.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:genetics.description: Defines the way a mob's genes and alleles are passed on to its offspring, and how those traits manifest in the child. Compatible parent genes are crossed together, the alleles are handed down from the parents to the child, and any matching genetic variants fire off JSON events to modify the child and express the traits.

genes.description: The list of genes that this entity has and will cross with a partner during breeding.

allele_range.description: The range of positive integer allele values for this gene. Spawned mobs will have a random number in this range assigned to them.

range_max.description: Upper bound of the allele values for this gene.

range_min.description: Lower bound of the allele values for this gene.

genetic_variants.description: The list of genetic variants for this gene. These check for particular allele combinations and fire events when all of them are satisfied.

birth_event.description: Event to run when this mob is created and matches the allele conditions.

both_allele.description: If this value is non-negative, compare both the mob's main and hidden alleles with this value for a match with both. Can also be a range of integers.

either_allele.description: If this value is non-negative, compare both the mob's main and hidden alleles with this value for a match with either. Can also be a range of integers.

hidden_allele.description: If this value is non-negative, compare the mob's hidden allele with this value for a match. Can also be a range of integers.

main_allele.description: If this value is non-negative, compare the mob's main allele with this value for a match. Can also be a range of integers.

mutation_rate.description: If this value is non-negative, overrides the chance for this gene that an allele will be replaced with a random one instead of the parent's allele during birth. Non-negative values greater than `1` will be the same as the value `1`.
Chance that an allele will be replaced with a random one instead of the parent's allele during birth.

minecraft:giveable.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:giveable.description: Defines sets of items that can be used to trigger events when used on this entity. The item will also be taken and placed in the entity's inventory.

cooldown.description: An optional cool down in seconds to prevent spamming interactions.

items.description: The list of items that can be given to the entity to place in their inventory.

on_give.description: Event to fire when the correct item is given.

minecraft:group_size.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:group_size.description: Keeps track of entity group size in the given radius.

filters.description: The list of conditions that must be satisfied for other entities to be counted towards group size.

minecraft:grows_crop.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:grows_crop.description: Could increase crop growth when entity walks over crop

chance.description: Value between 0-1. Chance of success per tick.

minecraft:healable.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:healable.description: Defines the interactions with this entity for healing it.

filters.description: The filter group that defines the conditions for using this item to heal the entity.

force_use.description: Determines if item can be used regardless of entity being at full health.

items.description: The array of items that can be used to heal this entity.

heal_amount.description: The amount of health this entity gains when fed this item.

item.description: Item identifier that can be used to heal this entity.

minecraft:home.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:home.description: Saves a home pos for when the the entity is spawned.

home_block_list.description: Optional block list that the home position will be associated with. If any of the blocks no longer exist at that position, the home restriction is removed. Example syntax: minecraft:sand. Not supported: minecraft:sand:1

restriction_radius.description: The radius that the entity will be restricted to in relation to its home

minecraft:hurt_on_condition.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:hurt_on_condition.description: Defines a set of conditions under which an entity should take damage.

damage_conditions.description: List of damage conditions that when met can cause damage to the entity.

cause.description: The kind of damage that is caused to the entity. Various armors and spells use this to determine if the entity is immune.

damage_per_tick.description: The amount of damage done each tick that the conditions are met.

filters.description: The set of conditions that must be satisfied before the entity takes the defined damage.

minecraft:inside_block_notifier.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:inside_block_notifier.description: Verifies whether the entity is inside any of the listed blocks.

block_list.description: List of blocks, with certain block states, that we are monitoring to see if the entity is inside.

entered_block_event.description: Event when the entity has entered the block

exited_block_event.description: Event whent the entity has exited the block

minecraft:insomnia.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:insomnia.description: Adds a timer since last rested to see if phantoms should spawn.

days_until_insomnia.description: Number of days the mob has to stay up until the insomnia effect begins.

remove_child_entities.description: If true, all entities linked to this entity in a child relationship (eg. leashed) will also be despawned.

on_interact.description: Event to fire when the interaction occurs.

cooldown.description: Time in seconds before this entity can be interacted with again.

use_item.description: If true, the interaction will use an item.

transform_to_item.description: The item used will transform to this item upon successful interaction. Format: itemName:auxValue

play_sounds.description: List of sounds to play when the interaction occurs.

interact_text.description: Text to show when the player is able to interact in this way with this entity when playing with Touch-screen controls.

hurt_item.description: The amount of damage the item will take when used to interact with this entity. A value of 0 means the item won't lose durability.

swing.description: If true, the player will do the 'swing' animation when interacting with this entity.

add_items.description: Loot table with items to add to the player's inventory upon successful interaction.

table.description: File path, relative to the Behavior Pack's path, to the loot table file.

cooldown_after_being_attacked.description: Time in seconds before this entity can be interacted with after being attacked.

particle_on_start.description: Particle effect that will be triggered at the start of the interaction.

particle_offset_towards_interactor.description: Whether or not the particle will appear closer to who performed the interaction.

particle_type.description: The type of particle that will be spawned.

particle_y_offset.description: Will offset the particle this amount in the y direction.

spawn_entities.description: List of entities to spawn when the interaction occurs.

spawn_items.description: Loot table with items to drop on the ground upon successful interaction.

table.description: File path, relative to the Behavior Pack's path, to the loot table file.

additional_slots_per_strength.description: Number of slots that this entity can gain per extra strength

can_be_siphoned_from.description: If true, the contents of this inventory can be removed by a hopper

container_type.description: Type of container this entity has. Can be horse, minecart_chest, minecart_hopper, inventory, chest_boat, container or hopper

inventory_size.description: Number of slots the container has

private.description: If true, the entity will not drop its inventory on death

restrict_to_owner.description: If true, the entity's inventory can only be accessed by its owner or itself

minecraft:item_hopper.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:item_hopper.description: Determines that this entity is an item hopper.

minecraft:leashable.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:leashable.description: Allows this entity to be leashed and defines the conditions and events for this entity when is leashed. Animation: `query.is_leashed`

can_be_stolen.description: If true, players can leash this entity even if it is already leashed to another mob.

hard_distance.description: Distance in blocks at which the leash stiffens, restricting movement.

max_distance.description: Distance in blocks at which the leash breaks.

on_leash.description: Event to call when this entity is leashed.

on_unleash.description: Event to call when this entity is unleashed.

soft_distance.description: Distance in blocks at which the 'spring' effect starts acting to keep this entity close to the entity that leashed it.

minecraft:lookat.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:lookat.description: Defines the behavior when another entity looks at this entity.

allow_invulnerable.description: If true, invulnerable entities (e.g. Players in creative mode) are considered valid targets.

filters.description: Defines the entities that can trigger this component.

look_cooldown.description: The range for the random amount of time during which the entity is 'cooling down' and won't get angered or look for a target.

look_event.description: The event identifier to run when the entities specified in filters look at this entity.

search_radius.description: Maximum distance this entity will look for another entity looking at it.

set_target.description: If true, this entity will set the attack target as the entity that looked at it.

minecraft:managed_wandering_trader.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:managed_wandering_trader.description: This component is used to implement part of the Wandering Trader behavior

minecraft:mob_effect.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:mob_effect.description: A component that applies a mob effect to entities that get within range.

effect_range.description: How close a hostile entity must be to have the mob effect applied.

effect_time.description: How long the applied mob effect lasts in seconds.

entity_filter.description: The set of entities that are valid to apply the mob effect to.

mob_effect.description: The mob effect that is applied to entities that enter this entities effect range.

minecraft:nameable.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:nameable.description: Allows this entity to be named (e.g. using a name tag).

allow_name_tag_renaming.description: If true, this entity can be renamed with name tags

always_show.description: If true, the name will always be shown

default_trigger.description: Trigger to run when the entity gets named

name_actions.description: Describes the special names for this entity and the events to call when the entity acquires those names

name_filter.description: List of special names that will cause the events defined in 'on_named' to fire

on_named.description: Event to be called when this entity acquires the name specified in 'name_filter'

minecraft:out_of_control.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:out_of_control.description: Defines the entity's 'out of control' state.

minecraft:peek.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:peek.description: Defines the entity's 'peek' behavior, defining the events that should be called during it.

on_close.description: Event to call when the entity is done peeking.

on_open.description: Event to call when the entity starts peeking.

on_target_open.description: Event to call when the entity's target entity starts peeking.

minecraft:persistent.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:persistent.description: Defines whether an entity should be persistent in the game world.

minecraft:physics.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:physics.description: Defines physics properties of an actor, including if it is affected by gravity or if it collides with objects.

has_collision.description: Whether or not the object collides with things.

has_gravity.description: Whether or not the entity is affected by gravity.

minecraft:preferred_path.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:preferred_path.description: Specifies costing information for mobs that prefer to walk on preferred paths.0

jump_cost.description: Added cost for jumping up a node

max_fall_blocks.description: Distance mob can fall without taking damage

preferred_path_blocks.description: A list of blocks with their associated cost

minecraft:projectile.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:projectile.description: Allows the entity to be a thrown entity.

angle_offset.description: Determines the angle at which the projectile is thrown

catch_fire.description: If true, the entity hit will be set on fire

crit_particle_on_hurt.description: If true, the projectile will produce additional particles when a critical hit happens

destroy_on_hurt.description: If true, this entity will be destroyed when hit

filter.description: Entity Definitions defined here can't be hurt by the projectile

fire_affected_by_griefing.description: If true, whether the projectile causes fire is affected by the mob griefing game rule

gravity.description: The gravity applied to this entity when thrown. The higher the value, the faster the entity falls

hit_sound.description: The sound that plays when the projectile hits something

homing.description: If true, the projectile homes in to the nearest entity

inertia.description: The fraction of the projectile's speed maintained every frame while traveling in air

is_dangerous.description: If true, the projectile will be treated as dangerous to the players

knockback.description: If true, the projectile will knock back the entity it hits

lightning.description: If true, the entity hit will be struck by lightning

liquid_inertia.description: The fraction of the projectile's speed maintained every frame while traveling in water

multiple_targets.description: If true, the projectile can hit multiple entities per flight

offset.description: The offset from the entity's anchor where the projectile will spawn

on_fire_time.description: Time in seconds that the entity hit will be on fire for

potion_effect.description: Defines the effect the arrow will apply to the entity it hits

power.description: Determines the velocity of the projectile

reflect_on_hurt.description: If true, this entity will be reflected back when hit

semi_random_diff_damage.description: If true, damage will be randomized based on damage and speed

shoot_sound.description: The sound that plays when the projectile is shot

shoot_target.description: If true, the projectile will be shot towards the target of the entity firing it

should_bounce.description: If true, the projectile will bounce upon hit

splash_potion.description: If true, the projectile will be treated like a splash potion

splash_range.description: Radius in blocks of the 'splash' effect

uncertainty_base.description: The base accuracy. Accuracy is determined by the formula uncertaintyBase - difficultyLevel * uncertaintyMultiplier

uncertainty_multiplier.description: Determines how much difficulty affects accuracy. Accuracy is determined by the formula uncertaintyBase - difficultyLevel * uncertaintyMultiplier

minecraft:pushable.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:pushable.description: Defines what can push an entity between other entities and pistons.

is_pushable.description: Whether the entity can be pushed by other entities.

is_pushable_by_piston.description: Whether the entity can be pushed by pistons safely.

minecraft:raid_trigger.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:raid_trigger.description: Attempts to trigger a raid at the entity's location.

triggered_event.description: Event to run we attempt to trigger a raid on the village.

minecraft:rail_movement.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:rail_movement.description: Defines the entity's movement on the rails. An entity with this component is only allowed to move on the rail.

max_speed.description: Maximum speed that this entity will move at when on the rail.

check_block_types.description: If true, on tick this entity will trigger its on_deactivate behavior

eject_on_activate.description: If true, this entity will eject all of its riders when it passes over an activated rail

eject_on_deactivate.description: If true, this entity will eject all of its riders when it passes over a deactivated rail

on_activate.description: Event to call when the rail is activated

on_deactivate.description: Event to call when the rail is deactivated

tick_command_block_on_activate.description: If true, command blocks will start ticking when passing over an activated rail

tick_command_block_on_deactivate.description: If false, command blocks will stop ticking when passing over a deactivated rail

minecraft:ravager_blocked.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:ravager_blocked.description: Defines the ravager's response to their melee attack being blocked.

knockback_strength.description: The strength with which blocking entities should be knocked back

reaction_choices.description: A list of weighted responses to the melee attack being blocked

minecraft:rideable.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:rideable.description: Determines whether this entity can be ridden. Allows specifying the different seat positions and quantity. Animation: `query.is_riding`

controlling_seat.description: The seat that designates the driver of the entity. This is only observed by the horse/boat styles of riding; minecarts/entities with "minecraft:controlled_by_player" give control to any player in any seat.

crouching_skip_interact.description: If true, this entity can't be interacted with if the entity interacting with it is crouching

family_types.description: List of entities that can ride this entity

interact_text.description: The text to display when the player can interact with the entity when playing with Touch-screen controls

passenger_max_width.description: The max width a mob can be to be a passenger. A value of 0 ignores this parameter.

priority.description: This field may exist in old data but isn't used by minecraft:rideable.

pull_in_entities.description: If true, this entity will pull in entities that are in the correct family_types into any available seats

rider_can_interact.description: If true, this entity will be picked when looked at by the rider

seat_count.description: The number of entities that can ride this entity at the same time

seats.description: The list of positions and number of riders for each position for entities riding this entity

lock_rider_rotation.description: Angle in degrees that a rider is allowed to rotate while riding this entity. Omit this property for no limit

max_rider_count.description: Defines the maximum number of riders that can be riding this entity for this seat to be valid

min_rider_count.description: Defines the minimum number of riders that need to be riding this entity before this seat can be used

position.description: Position of this seat relative to this entity's position

minecraft:scale_by_age.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:scale_by_age.description: Defines the entity's size interpolation based on the entity's age.

end_scale.description: Ending scale of the entity when it's fully grown.

start_scale.description: Initial scale of the newborn entity.

minecraft:scheduler.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:scheduler.description: Fires off scheduled mob events at time of day events.

scheduled_events.description: The list of triggers that fire when the conditions match the given filter criteria. If any filter criteria overlap the first defined event will be picked.

minecraft:shareables.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:shareables.description: Defines a list of items the mob wants to share or pick up. Each item must have the following parameters:

all_items.description: A bucket for all other items in the game. Note this category is always least priority items.

all_items_max_amount.description: Maximum number of this item the mob will hold.

all_items_surplus_amount.description: Number of this item considered extra that the entity wants to share.

all_items_want_amount.description: Number of this item this entity wants to share.

items.description: List of items that the entity wants to share.

admire.description: Mob will admire the item after picking up by looking at it. For this to happen the mob needs to have an Admire component and an Admire goal.

barter.description: Mob will barter for the item after picking it up. For this to work the mob needs to have a Barter component and a Barter goal.

consume_item.description: Determines whether the mob will consume the item or not.

craft_into.description: Defines the item this entity wants to craft with the item defined by "item". Should be an item name.

item.description: The name of the item. Aux value can be specified, for instance 'minecraft:skull:1'.

max_amount.description: Maximum number of this item the mob will hold.

pickup_limit.description: Maximum number of this item the mob will pick up during a single goal tick.

priority.description: Prioritizes which items the entity prefers. 0 is the highest priority.

stored_in_inventory.description: Determines whether the mob will try to put the item in its inventory if it has the inventory component and if it can't be equipped.

surplus_amount.description: Number of this item considered extra that the entity wants to share.

want_amount.description: Number of this item this entity wants to have.

minecraft:shooter.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:shooter.description: Defines the entity's ranged attack behavior.

aux_val.description: ID of the Potion effect to be applied on hit

def.description: Actor definition to use as projectile for the ranged attack. The actor definition must have the projectile component to be able to be shot as a projectile

sit_event.description: Event to run when the entity enters the 'sit' state

stand_event.description: Event to run when the entity exits the 'sit' state

minecraft:spawn_entity.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:spawn_entity.description: Adds a timer after which this entity will spawn another entity or item (similar to vanilla's chicken's egg-laying behavior).

filters.description: If present, the specified entity will only spawn if the filter evaluates to true.

max_wait_time.description: Maximum amount of time to randomly wait in seconds before another entity is spawned.

min_wait_time.description: Minimum amount of time to randomly wait in seconds before another entity is spawned.

num_to_spawn.description: The number of entities of this type to spawn each time that this triggers.

should_leash.description: If true, this the spawned entity will be leashed to the parent.

single_use.description: If true, this component will only ever spawn the specified entity once.

spawn_entity.description: Identifier of the entity to spawn, leave empty to spawn the item defined by "spawn_item" instead.

spawn_event.description: Event to call when the entity is spawned.

spawn_item.description: Item identifier of the item to spawn.

spawn_method.description: Method to use to spawn the entity.

spawn_sound.description: Identifier of the sound effect to play when the entity is spawned.

minecraft:tameable.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:tameable.description: Defines the rules for a mob to be tamed by the player. Animation: `query.is_tamed`

probability.description: The chance of taming the entity with each item use between 0.0 and 1.0, where 1.0 is 100%

tame_event.description: Event to run when this entity becomes tamed

tame_items.description: The list of items that can be used to tame this entity

minecraft:tamemount.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:tamemount.description: Allows the Entity to be tamed by mounting it.

attempt_temper_mod.description: The amount the entity's temper will increase when mounted.

autoRejectItems.description: The list of items that, if carried while interacting with the entity, will anger it.

item.description: Name of the item this entity dislikes and will cause it to get angry if used while untamed.

feed_items.description: The list of items that can be used to increase the entity's temper and speed up the taming process.

item.description: Name of the item this entity likes and can be used to increase this entity's temper.

temper_mod.description: The amount of temper this entity gains when fed this item.

feed_text.description: The text that shows in the feeding interact button.

max_temper.description: The maximum value for the entity's random starting temper.

min_temper.description: The minimum value for the entity's random starting temper.

ride_text.description: The text that shows in the riding interact button.

tame_event.description: Event that triggers when the entity becomes tamed.

minecraft:target_nearby_sensor.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:target_nearby_sensor.description: Defines the entity's range within which it can see or sense other entities to target them.

inside_range.description: Maximum distance in blocks that another entity will be considered in the 'inside' range

must_see.description: Whether the other entity needs to be visible to trigger 'inside' events

on_inside_range.description: Event to call when an entity gets in the inside range. Can specify 'event' for the name of the event and 'target' for the target of the event

on_outside_range.description: Event to call when an entity gets in the outside range. Can specify 'event' for the name of the event and 'target' for the target of the event

on_vision_lost_inside_range.description: Event to call when an entity exits visual range. Can specify 'event' for the name of the event and 'target' for the target of the event

outside_range.description: Maximum distance in blocks that another entity will be considered in the 'outside' range

dark_teleport_chance.description: Modifies the chance that the entity will teleport if the entity is in darkness

light_teleport_chance.description: Modifies the chance that the entity will teleport if the entity is in daylight

max_random_teleport_time.description: Maximum amount of time in seconds between random teleports

min_random_teleport_time.description: Minimum amount of time in seconds between random teleports

random_teleport_cube.description: Entity will teleport to a random position within the area defined by this cube

random_teleports.description: If true, the entity will teleport randomly

target_distance.description: Maximum distance the entity will teleport when chasing a target

target_teleport_chance.description: The chance that the entity will teleport between 0.0 and 1.0. 1.0 means 100%

minecraft:tick_world.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:tick_world.description: Defines if the entity ticks the world and the radius around it to tick.

distance_to_players.description: The distance at which the closest player has to be before this entity despawns. This option will be ignored if never_despawn is true. Min: 128 blocks.

never_despawn.description: If true, this entity will not despawn even if players are far away. If false, distance_to_players will be used to determine when to despawn.

radius.description: The area around the entity to tick. Default: 2. Allowed range: 2-6.

minecraft:timer.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:timer.description: Adds a timer after which an event will fire.

looping.description: If true, the timer will restart every time after it fires.

randomInterval.description: If true, the amount of time on the timer will be random between the min and max values specified in time.

random_time_choices.description: This is a list of objects, representing one value in seconds that can be picked before firing the event and an optional weight. Incompatible with time.

time.description: Amount of time in seconds for the timer. Can be specified as a number or a pair of numbers (min and max). Incompatible with random_time_choices.

time_down_event.description: Event to fire when the time on the timer runs out.

minecraft:trade_table.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:trade_table.description: Defines this entity's ability to trade with players.

convert_trades_economy.description: Determines when the mob transforms, if the trades should be converted when the new mob has a economy_trade_table. When the trades are converted, the mob will generate a new trade list with their new trade table, but then it will try to convert any of the same trades over to have the same enchantments and user data. For example, if the original has a Emerald to Enchanted Iron Sword (Sharpness 1), and the new trade also has an Emerald for Enchanted Iron Sword, then the enchantment will be Sharpness 1.

display_name.description: Name to be displayed while trading with this entity.

new_screen.description: Used to determine if trading with entity opens the new trade screen.

persist_trades.description: Determines if the trades should persist when the mob transforms. This makes it so that the next time the mob is transformed to something with a trade_table or economy_trade_table, then it keeps their trades.

table.description: File path relative to the behavior pack root for this entity's trades.

minecraft:trail.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:trail.description: Causes an entity to leave a trail of blocks as it moves about the world.

block_type.description: The type of block you wish to be spawned by the entity as it move about the world. Solid blocks may not be spawned at an offset of (0,0,0).

spawn_filter.description: One or more conditions that must be met in order to cause the chosen block type to spawn.

spawn_offset.description: The distance from the entities current position to spawn the block. Capped at up to 16 blocks away. The X value is left/right(-/+), the Z value is backward/forward(-/+), the Y value is below/above(-/+).

minecraft:transformation.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:transformation.description: Defines an entity's transformation from the current definition into another. Animation: `query.is_transforming`

add.description: List of components to add to the entity after the transformation

component_groups.description: Names of component groups to add

begin_transform_sound.description: Sound to play when the transformation starts

delay.description: Defines the properties of the delay for the transformation

block_assist_chance.description: Chance that the entity will look for nearby blocks that can speed up the transformation. Value must be between 0.0 and 1.0

block_chance.description: Chance that, once a block is found, will help speed up the transformation

block_max.description: Maximum number of blocks the entity will look for to aid in the transformation. If not defined or set to 0, it will be set to the block radius

block_radius.description: Distance in Blocks that the entity will search for blocks that can help the transformation

block_types.description: List of blocks that can help the transformation of this entity

value.description: Time in seconds before the entity transforms

drop_equipment.description: Cause the entity to drop all equipment upon transformation

drop_inventory.description: Cause the entity to drop all items in inventory upon transformation

into.description: Entity Definition that this entity will transform into

keep_level.description: If this entity has trades and has leveled up, it should maintain that level after transformation.

keep_owner.description: If this entity is owned by another entity, it should remain owned after transformation.

preserve_equipment.description: Cause the entity to keep equipment after going through transformation

transformation_sound.description: Sound to play when the entity is done transforming

minecraft:trusting.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:trusting.description: Defines the rules for a mob to trust players.

probability.description: The chance of the entity trusting with each item use between 0.0 and 1.0, where 1.0 is 100%.

trust_event.description: Event to run when this entity becomes trusting.

trust_items.description: The list of items that can be used to get the entity to trust players.

drag_factor.description: Drag factor to determine movement speed when in water.

minecraft:ambient_sound_interval.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:ambient_sound_interval.description: Sets the entity's delay between playing its ambient sound.

event_name.description: Level sound event to be played as the ambient sound.

range.description: Maximum time in seconds to randomly add to the ambient sound delay time.

value.description: Minimum time in seconds before the entity plays its ambient sound again.

minecraft:can_climb.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:can_climb.description: Allows this entity to climb up ladders.

minecraft:can_fly.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:can_fly.description: Marks the entity as being able to fly, the pathfinder won't be restricted to paths where a solid block is required underneath it.

minecraft:can_power_jump.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:can_power_jump.description: Allows the entity to power jump like the horse does in vanilla.

minecraft:collision_box.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:collision_box.description: Sets the width and height of the Entity's collision box.

height.description: Height of the collision box in blocks. A negative value will be assumed to be 0.

width.description: Width and Depth of the collision box in blocks. A negative value will be assumed to be 0.

minecraft:color.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:color.description: Defines the entity's color. Only works on vanilla entities that have predefined color values (sheep, llama, shulker).

value.description: The Palette Color value of the entity.

minecraft:color2.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:color2.description: Defines the entity's second texture color. Only works on vanilla entities that have a second predefined color values (tropical fish).

value.description: The second Palette Color value of the entity.

minecraft:default_look_angle.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:default_look_angle.description: Sets this entity's default head rotation angle.

value.description: Angle in degrees.

minecraft:equipment.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:equipment.description: Sets the Equipment table to use for this Entity.

slot_drop_chance.description: A list of slots with the chance to drop an equipped item from that slot.

table.description: The file path to the equipment table, relative to the behavior pack's root.

minecraft:fire_immune.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:fire_immune.description: Sets that this entity doesn't take damage from fire. Animation: `query.is_fire_immune`

minecraft:floats_in_liquid.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:floats_in_liquid.description: Sets that this entity can float in liquid blocks.

minecraft:flying_speed.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:flying_speed.description: Speed in Blocks that this entity flies at.

value.description: Flying speed in blocks per tick.

minecraft:friction_modifier.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:friction_modifier.description: Defines how much friction affects this entity.

value.description: The higher the number, the more the friction affects this entity. A value of 1.0 means regular friction, while 2.0 means twice as much.

minecraft:ground_offset.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:ground_offset.description: Sets the offset from the ground that the entity is actually at.

value.description: The value of the entity's offset from the terrain, in blocks.

minecraft:input_ground_controlled.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:input_ground_controlled.description: When configured as a rideable entity, the entity will be controlled using WASD controls.

minecraft:is_baby.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:is_baby.description: Sets that this entity is a baby. Animation: `query.is_baby`

minecraft:is_charged.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:is_charged.description: Sets that this entity is charged. Animation: `query.is_charged`

minecraft:is_chested.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:is_chested.description: Sets that this entity is currently carrying a chest. Animation: `query.is_chested`

minecraft:is_dyeable.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:is_dyeable.description: Allows dyes to be used on this entity to change its color.

interact_text.description: The text that will display when interacting with this entity with a dye when playing with Touch-screen controls.

minecraft:is_hidden_when_invisible.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:is_hidden_when_invisible.description: Sets that this entity can hide from hostile mobs while invisible.

minecraft:is_ignited.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:is_ignited.description: Sets that this entity is currently on fire. Animation: `query.is_ignited`

minecraft:is_illager_captain.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:is_illager_captain.description: Sets that this entity is an illager captain. Animation: `query.is_illager_captain`

minecraft:is_saddled.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:is_saddled.description: Sets that this entity is currently saddled. Animation: `query.is_saddled`

minecraft:is_shaking.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:is_shaking.description: Sets that this entity is currently shaking. Animation: `query.is_shaking`

minecraft:is_sheared.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:is_sheared.description: Sets that this entity is currently sheared. Animation: `query.is_sheared`

minecraft:is_stackable.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:is_stackable.description: Sets that this entity can be stacked. Animation: `query.is_stackable`

minecraft:is_stunned.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:is_stunned.description: Sets that this entity is currently stunned. Animation: `query.is_stunned`

minecraft:is_tamed.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:is_tamed.description: Sets that this entity is currently tamed. Animation: `query.is_tamed`

minecraft:is_pregnant.title: COMPONENT
minecraft:is_pregnant.description: Sets that this entity is currently pregnant. Animation: `query.is_pregnant`

minecraft:item_controllable.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:item_controllable.description: Defines what items can be used to control this entity while ridden.

control_items.description: List of items that can be used to control this entity.

minecraft:loot.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:loot.description: Sets the loot table for what items this entity drops upon death.

talbe.description: The path to the loot table, relative to the Behavior Pack's root.

minecraft:mark_variant.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:mark_variant.description: Additional variant value. Can be used to further differentiate variants.

value.description: The ID of the variant. By convention, 0 is the ID of the base entity.

minecraft:push_through.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:push_through.description: Sets the distance through which the entity can push through.

value.description: The value of the entity's push-through, in blocks.
The value of the scale. 1.0 means the entity will appear at the scale they are defined in their model. Higher numbers make the entity bigger.

minecraft:skin_id.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:skin_id.description: Skin ID value. Can be used to differentiate skins, such as base skins for villagers.

value.description: The ID of the skin. By convention, 0 is the ID of the base skin.

minecraft:sound_volume.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:sound_volume.description: Sets the entity's base volume for sound effects.

value.description: The value of the volume the entity uses for sound effects.

minecraft:type_family.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:type_family.description: Defines the families this entity belongs to.

minecraft:variant.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:variant.description: Used to differentiate the component group of a variant of an entity from others. (e.g. ocelot, villager)

value.description: The ID of the variant. By convention, 0 is the ID of the base entity.

minecraft:walk_animation_speed.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:walk_animation_speed.description: Sets the speed multiplier for this entity's walk animation speed.

value.description: The higher the number, the faster the animation for walking plays. A value of 1.0 means normal speed, while 2.0 means twice as fast.

minecraft:wants_jockey.title: PROPERTY
minecraft:wants_jockey.description: Sets that this entity wants to become a jockey.

minecraft:on_death.title: TRIGGER
minecraft:on_death.description: Only usable by the Ender Dragon. Adds a trigger to call on this entity's death.

event.description: The event to run when the conditions for this trigger are met.

filters.description: The list of conditions for this trigger to execute.

minecraft:on_friendly_anger.title: TRIGGER
minecraft:on_friendly_anger.description: Adds a trigger that will run when a nearby entity of the same type as this entity becomes Angry.

event.description: The event to run when the conditions for this trigger are met.

filters.description: The list of conditions for this trigger to execute.

minecraft:on_hurt.title: TRIGGER
minecraft:on_hurt.description: Adds a trigger to call when this entity takes damage.

event.description: The event to run when the conditions for this trigger are met.

filters.description: The list of conditions for this trigger to execute.

minecraft:on_hurt_by_player.title: TRIGGER
minecraft:on_hurt_by_player.description: Adds a trigger to call when this entity is attacked by the player.

event.description: The event to run when the conditions for this trigger are met.

filters.description: The list of conditions for this trigger to execute.

minecraft:on_ignite.title: TRIGGER
minecraft:on_ignite.description: Adds a trigger to call when this entity is set on fire.

event.description: The event to run when the conditions for this trigger are met.

filters.description: The list of conditions for this trigger to execute.

minecraft:on_start_landing.title: TRIGGER
minecraft:on_start_landing.description: Only usable by the Ender Dragon. Adds a trigger to call when this entity lands.

event.description: The event to run when the conditions for this trigger are met.

filters.description: The list of conditions for this trigger to execute.

minecraft:on_start_takeoff.title: TRIGGER
minecraft:on_start_takeoff.description: Only usable by the Ender Dragon. Adds a trigger to call when this entity starts flying.

event.description: The event to run when the conditions for this trigger are met.

filters.description: The list of conditions for this trigger to execute.

minecraft:on_target_acquired.title: TRIGGER
minecraft:on_target_acquired.description: Adds a trigger to call when this entity finds a target.

event.description: The event to run when the conditions for this trigger are met.

filters.description: The list of conditions for this trigger to execute.

minecraft:on_target_escape.title: TRIGGER
minecraft:on_target_escape.description: Adds a trigger to call when this entity loses the target it currently has.

event.description: The event to run when the conditions for this trigger are met.

filters.description: The list of conditions for this trigger to execute.

minecraft:on_wake_with_owner.title: TRIGGER
minecraft:on_wake_with_owner.description: Adds a trigger to call when this pet's owner awakes after sleeping with the pet.

event.description: The event to run when the conditions for this trigger are met.

filters.description: The list of conditions for this trigger to execute.

minecraft:angry.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:angry.description: Defines the entity's 'angry' state using a timer.

angry_sound.description: The sound event to play when the mob is angry

broadcast_anger.description: If true, other entities of the same entity definition within the broadcastRange will also become angry

broadcast_anger_on_attack.description: If true, other entities of the same entity definition within the broadcastRange will also become angry whenever this mob attacks

broadcast_anger_on_being_attacked.description: If true, other entities of the same entity definition within the broadcastRange will also become angry whenever this mob is attacked

broadcast_filters.description: Conditions that make this entry in the list valid

broadcast_range.description: Distance in blocks within which other entities of the same entity definition will become angry

broadcast_targets.description: A list of entity families to broadcast anger to

calm_event.description: Event to run after the number of seconds specified in duration expires (when the entity stops being 'angry')

duration.description: The amount of time in seconds that the entity will be angry

duration_delta.description: Variance in seconds added to the duration [-delta, delta]

filters.description: Filter out mob types that it should not attack while angry (other Piglins)

sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again

minecraft:ageable.title: COMPONENTS
minecraft:ageable.description: Adds a timer for the entity to grow up. It can be accelerated by giving the entity the items it likes as defined by feedItems.

drop_items.description: List of items that the entity drops when it grows up.

duration.description: Amount of time before the entity grows up, -1 for always a baby.

feed_items.description: List of items that can be fed to the entity. Includes 'item' for the item name and 'growth' to define how much time it grows up by

grow_up.description: Event to run when this entity grows up.

transform_to_item.description: The feed item used will transform to this item upon successful interaction. Format: itemName:auxValue

minecraft:jump.dynamic.title: JUMP
minecraft:jump.dynamic.description: Defines a dynamic type jump control that will change jump properties based on the speed modifier of the mob.

minecraft:jump.static.title: JUMP
minecraft:jump.static.description: Gives the entity the ability to jump. Animation: `query.is_jumping`

jump_power.description: The initial vertical velocity for the jump

minecraft:movement.amphibious.title: MOVEMENT
minecraft:movement.amphibious.description: This move control allows the mob to swim in water and walk on land. `query.is_swimming`

max_turn.description: The maximum number in degrees the mob can turn per tick

minecraft:movement.basic.title: MOVEMENT
minecraft:movement.basic.description: This component accents the movement of an entity.

max_turn.description: The maximum number in degrees the mob can turn per tick.

minecraft:movement.fly.title: MOVEMENT
minecraft:movement.fly.description: This move control causes the mob to fly.

max_turn.description: The maximum number in degrees the mob can turn per tick.

minecraft:movement.generic.title: MOVEMENT
minecraft:movement.generic.description: This move control allows a mob to fly, swim, climb, etc.

max_turn.description: The maximum number in degrees the mob can turn per tick.

minecraft:movement.hover.title: MOVEMENT
minecraft:movement.hover.description: This move control causes the mob to hover.

max_turn.description: The maximum number in degrees the mob can turn per tick.

minecraft:movement.jump.title: MOVEMENT
minecraft:movement.jump.description: Move control that causes the mob to jump as it moves with a specified delay between jumps.

jump_delay.description: Delay after landing when using the slime move control.

max_turn.description: The maximum number in degrees the mob can turn per tick.

minecraft:movement.skip.title: MOVEMENT
minecraft:movement.skip.description: This move control causes the mob to hop as it moves.

max_turn.description: The maximum number in degrees the mob can turn per tick.

minecraft:movement.sway.title: MOVEMENT
minecraft:movement.sway.description: This move control causes the mob to sway side to side giving the impression it is swimming.

max_turn.description: The maximum number in degrees the mob can turn per tick.

sway_frequency.description: Multiplier for the frequency of the sway movement.

minecraft:navigation.climb.title: NAVIGATION
minecraft:navigation.climb.description: Allows this entity to generate paths that include vertical walls like the vanilla Spiders do. Animation: `query.is_wall_climbing`

avoid_damage_blocks.description: Tells the pathfinder to avoid blocks that cause damage when finding a path

avoid_portals.description: Tells the pathfinder to avoid portals (like nether portals) when finding a path

avoid_sun.description: Whether or not the pathfinder should avoid tiles that are exposed to the sun when creating paths

avoid_water.description: Tells the pathfinder to avoid water when creating a path

blocks_to_avoid.description: Tells the pathfinder which blocks to avoid when creating a path

can_breach.description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can jump out of water (like a dolphin)

can_break_doors.description: Tells the pathfinder that it can path through a closed door and break it

can_jump.description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can jump up blocks

can_open_doors.description: Tells the pathfinder that it can path through a closed door assuming the AI will open the door

can_open_iron_doors.description: Tells the pathfinder that it can path through a closed iron door assuming the AI will open the door

can_pass_doors.description: Whether a path can be created through a door

can_path_from_air.description: Tells the pathfinder that it can start pathing when in the air

can_path_over_lava.description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can travel on the surface of the lava

can_path_over_water.description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can travel on the surface of the water

can_sink.description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it will be pulled down by gravity while in water

can_swim.description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can path anywhere through water and plays swimming animation along that path
