can_walk.description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can walk on the ground outside water

can_walk_in_lava.description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can travel in lava like walking on ground

is_amphibious.description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can walk on the ground underwater

minecraft:behavior.swim_with_entity.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.swim_with_entity.description: Allows the entity follow another entity. Both entities must be swimming [ie, in water].

catch_up_multiplier.description: The multiplier this entity's speed is modified by when matching another entity's direction.

catch_up_threshold.description: Distance, from the entity being followed, at which this entity will speed up to reach that entity.

chance_to_stop.description: Percent chance to stop following the current entity, if they're riding another entity or they're not swimming. 1.0 = 100%

entity_types.description: Filters which types of entities are valid to follow.

match_direction_threshold.description: Distance, from the entity being followed, at which this entity will try to match that entity's direction

search_range.description: Radius around this entity to search for another entity to follow.

speed_multiplier.description: The multiplier this entity's speed is modified by when trying to catch up to the entity being followed.

state_check_interval.description: The multiplier this entity's speed is modified by when trying to catch up to the entity being followed.

stop_distance.description: Distance, from the entity being followed, at which this entity will stop following that entity.

success_rate.description: Percent chance to start following another entity, if not already doing so. 1.0 = 100%

minecraft:behavior.guardian_attack.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.guardian_attack.description: Allows this entity to use a laser beam attack. Can only be used by Guardians and Elder Guardians.

elder_extra_magic_damage.description: Amount of additional damage dealt from an elder guardian's magic attack.

hard_mode_extra_magic_damage.description: In hard difficulty, amount of additional damage dealt from a guardian's magic attack.

magic_damage.description: Amount of damage dealt from a guardian's magic attack. Magic attack damage is added to the guardian's base attack damage.

min_distance.description: Guardian attack behavior stops if the target is closer than this distance (doesn't apply to elders).

sound_delay_time.description: Guardian attack behavior stops if the target is closer than this distance (doesn't apply to elders).

x_max_rotation.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

y_max_head_rotation.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

minecraft:behavior.swim_wander.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.swim_wander.description: Allows the entity to wander around while swimming, when not path-finding.

interval.description: Percent chance to start wandering, when not path-finding. 1 = 100%

look_ahead.description: Distance to look ahead for obstacle avoidance, while wandering.

speed_multiplier.description: This multiplier modifies the entity's speed when wandering.

wander_time.description: Amount of time (in seconds) to wander after wandering behavior was successfully started.

minecraft:behavior.jump_to_block.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.jump_to_block.description: Allows an entity to jump to another random block.

cooldown_range.description: Minimum and maximum cooldown time-range (positive, in seconds) between each attempted jump.

forbidden_blocks.description: Blocks that the mob can't jump to.

max_velocity.description: The maximum velocity with which the mob can jump.

minimum_distance.description: The minimum distance (in blocks) from the mob to a block, in order to consider jumping to it.

minimum_path_length.description: The minimum length (in blocks) of the mobs path to a block, in order to consider jumping to it.

preferred_blocks.description: Blocks that the mob prefers jumping to.

preferred_blocks_chance.description: Chance (between 0.0 and 1.0) that the mob will jump to a preferred block, if in range. Only matters if preferred blocks are defined.

scale_factor.description: The scalefactor of the bounding box of the mob while it is jumping.

search_height.description: The height (in blocks, in range [2, 15]) of the search box, centered around the mob.

search_width.description: The width (in blocks, in range [2, 15]) of the search box, centered around the mob.

minecraft:behavior.ram_attack.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.ram_attack.description: Allows this entity to damage a target by using a running attack. Animation: `query.is_ram_attacking`

baby_knockback_modifier.description: The modifier to knockback that babies have.

cooldown_range.description: Minimum and maximum cooldown time-range (positive, in seconds) between each attempted ram attack.

knockback_force.description: The force of the knockback of the ram attack.

knockback_height.description: The height of the knockback of the ram attack.

min_ram_distance.description: The minimum distance at which the mob can start a ram attack.

on_start.description: The event to trigger when attacking

pre_ram_sound.description: The sound to play when an entity is about to perform a ram attack.

ram_distance.description: The distance at which the mob start to run with ram speed.

ram_impact_sound.description: The distance at which the mob start to run with ram speed.

ram_speed.description: Sets the entity's speed when charging toward the target.

run_speed.description: Sets the entity's speed when running toward the target.

minecraft:behavior.avoid_block.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.avoid_block.description: Allows this entity to avoid certain blocks. Animation: `query.is_avoiding_block`

avoid_block_sound.description: The sound event to play when the mob is avoiding a block.

search_height.description: Maximum distance to look for a block in y.

search_range.description: Maximum distance to look for a block in xz.

sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.

sprint_speed_modifier.description: Modifier for sprint speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the sprint speed faster.

target_blocks.description: List of block types this mob avoids.

walk_speed_modifier.description: Modifier for walking speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the walking speed faster.

minecraft:behavior.defend_village_target.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.defend_village_target.description: Allows the entity to stay in a village and defend the village from aggressors. If a player is in bad standing with the village this goal will cause the entity to attack the player regardless of filter conditions.

attack_chance.description: The percentage chance that the entity has to attack aggressors of its village, where 1.0 = 100%.

minecraft:behavior.slime_float.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.slime_float.description: Allow slimes to float in water / lava. Can only be used by Slime and Magma Cubes.

jump_chance_percentage.description: Percent chance a slime or magma cube has to jump while in water / lava.

speed_multiplier.description: Determines the multiplier the entity's speed is modified by when moving through water / lava.

minecraft:behavior.slime_random_directio.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.slime_random_directio.description: Allows the entity to move in random directions like a slime.

add_random_time_range.description: Additional time (in whole seconds), chosen randomly in the range of [0, "add_random_time_range"], to add to "min_change_direction_time".

min_change_direction_time.description: Constant minimum time (in seconds) to wait before choosing a new direction.

turn_range.description: Maximum rotation angle range (in degrees) when randomly choosing a new direction.

minecraft:behavior.slime_keep_on_jumping.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.slime_keep_on_jumping.description: Allows the entity to continuously jump around like a slime.

speed_multiplier.description: Determines the multiplier this entity's speed is modified by when jumping around.

minecraft:behavior.swoop_attack.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.swoop_attack.description: Allows an entity to attack using swoop attack behavior; Ideal for use with flying mobs. The behavior ends if the entity has a horizontal collision or gets hit.

damage_reach.description: Added to the base size of the entity, to determine the target's maximum allowable distance, when trying to deal attack damage.

delay_range.description: Minimum and maximum cooldown time-range (in seconds) between each attempted swoop attack.

speed_multiplier.description: During swoop attack behavior, this determines the multiplier the entity's speed is modified by when moving toward the target.

minecraft:behavior.stomp_attack.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.stomp_attack.description: Allows an entity to attack using stomp AoE damage behavior.

attack_once.description: Allows the entity to use this attack behavior, only once EVER.

attack_types.description: Defines the entity types this entity will attack.

inner_boundary_time_increase.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when the target is beyond the "path_inner_boundary".

max_dist.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when the target is beyond the "path_inner_boundary".

max_path_time.description: Maximum base time (in seconds) to recalculate new attack path to target (before increases applied).

melee_fov.description: Field of view (in degrees) when using the sensing component to detect an attack target.

min_path_time.description: Minimum base time (in seconds) to recalculate new attack path to target (before increases applied).

no_damage_range_multiplier.description: Multiplied with the final AoE damage range to determine a no damage range. The stomp attack will go on cooldown if target is in this no damage range.

on_attack.description: Defines the event to trigger when this entity successfully attacks.

outer_boundary_time_increase.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when the target is beyond the "path_outer_boundary".

path_fail_time_increase.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when this entity cannot move along the current path.

path_inner_boundary.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "inner_boundary_tick_increase".

path_outer_boundary.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "outer_boundary_tick_increase".

random_stop_interval.description: This entity will have a 1 in N chance to stop it's current attack, where N = "random_stop_interval".

reach_multiplier.description: This entity will have a 1 in N chance to stop it's current attack, where N = "random_stop_interval".

require_complete_path.description: Toggles (on/off) the need to have a full path from the entity to the target when using this melee attack behavior.

set_persistent.description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player

speed_multiplier.description: This multiplier modifies the attacking entity's speed when moving toward the target.

stomp_range_multiplier.description: Multiplied with the base size of the entity to determine stomp AoE damage range.

track_target.description: Allows the entity to track the attack target, even if the entity has no sensing.

x_max_rotation.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

y_max_head_rotation.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.

minecraft:behavior.move_outdoors.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.move_outdoors.description: Allows this entity to move outdoors.

goal_radius.description: The radius away from the target block to count as reaching the goal.

search_count.description: The radius away from the target block to count as reaching the goal.

search_height.description: The y range to search for an outdoors position for.

search_range.description: The x and z range to search for an outdoors position for.

speed_multiplier.description: The x and z range to search for an outdoors position for.

timeout_cooldown.description: The cooldown time in seconds before the goal can be reused after pathfinding fails

minecraft:behavior.harvest_farm_block.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.harvest_farm_block.description: Allows the entity to search within an area for farmland with air above it. If found, the entity will replace the air block by planting a seed item from its inventory on the farmland block. This goal requires "minecraft:inventory" and "minecraft:navigation" to execute. This goal will not execute if the entity does not have an item in its inventory.

goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the entity considers it has reached it's target position.

max_seconds_before_search.description: The maximum amount of time in seconds that the goal can take before searching for the first harvest block. The time is chosen between 0 and this number.

search_cooldown_max_seconds.description: The maximum amount of time in seconds that the goal can take before searching again, after failing to find a a harvest block already. The time is chosen between 0 and this number.

search_count.description: The number of randomly selected blocks each tick that the entity will check within its search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick.

search_height.description: The number of randomly selected blocks each tick that the entity will check within its search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick.

search_range.description: The number of randomly selected blocks each tick that the entity will check within its search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick.

seconds_until_new_task.description: The amount of time in seconds that the goal will cooldown after a successful reap/sow, before it can start again.

speed_multiplier.description: The amount of time in seconds that the goal will cooldown after a successful reap/sow, before it can start again.

minecraft:behavior.work_composter.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.work_composter.description: Allows the NPC to use the composter POI to convert excess seeds into bone meal.

active_time.description: The amount of ticks the NPC will stay in their the work location

block_interaction_max.description: The amount of ticks the NPC will stay in their the work location

can_empty_composter.description: Determines whether the mob can empty a full composter.

can_fill_composter.description: Determines whether the mob can add items to a composter given that it is not full.

can_work_in_rain.description: If true, this entity can work when their jobsite POI is being rained on.

goal_cooldown.description: The amount of ticks the goal will be on cooldown before it can be used again

items_per_use_max.description: The maximum number of items which can be added to the composter per block interaction.

min_item_count.description: Limits the amount of each compostable item the mob can use. Any amount held over this number will be composted if possible

on_arrival.description: Event to run when the mob reaches their jobsite.

speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

use_block_max.description: The maximum interval in which the mob will interact with the composter.

use_block_min.description: The minimum interval in which the mob will interact with the composter.

work_in_rain_tolerance.description: If "can_work_in_rain" is false, this is the maximum number of ticks left in the goal where rain will not interrupt the goal

minecraft:behavior.roar.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.roar.description: Allows this entity to roar at another entity based on data in minecraft:anger_level. Once the anger threshold specified in minecraft:anger_level has been reached, this entity will roar for the specified amount of time, look at the other entity, apply anger boost towards it, and finally target it.

duration.description: The amount of time to roar for.

minecraft:behavior.sonic_boom.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.sonic_boom.description: Allows this entity to perform a 'sonic boom' ranged attack. Animation: `query.is_sonic_boom`

attack_cooldown.description: Cooldown in seconds required after using this attack until the entity can use sonic boom again.

attack_damage.description: Cooldown in seconds required after using this attack until the entity can use sonic boom again.

attack_range_horizontal.description: Cooldown in seconds required after using this attack until the entity can use sonic boom again.

attack_range_vertical.description: Vertical range (in blocks) at which the sonic boom can damage the target.

duration_until_attack_sound.description: Duration in seconds until the attack sound is played.

knockback_height_cap.description: Height cap of the attack knockback's vertical delta.

knockback_horizontal_strength.description: Horizontal strength of the attack's knockback applied to the attack target.

knockback_vertical_strength.description: Vertical strength of the attack's knockback applied to the attack target.

speed_multiplier.description: This multiplier modifies the attacking entity's speed when moving toward the target.

minecraft:behavior.investigate_suspiciou.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.investigate_suspiciou.description: Allows this entity to move towards a "suspicious" position based on data gathered in minecraft:suspect_tracking

goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the entity considers it has reached it's target position.

speed_multiplier.description: Distance in blocks within the entity considers it has reached it's target position.

minecraft:behavior.sniff.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.sniff.description: Allows this entity to detect the nearest player within "sniffing_radius" and update its "minecraft:suspect_tracking" component state. Animation: `query.is_sniffing`

cooldown_range.description: Cooldown range between sniffs in seconds

suspicion_radius_horizontal.description: Mob suspicion horizontal radius. When a player is within this radius horizontally, the anger level towards that player is increased

suspicion_radius_vertical.description: Mob suspicion vertical radius. When a player is within this radius vertically, the anger level towards that player is increased

minecraft:behavior.delayed_attack.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.delayed_attack.description: Allows an entity to attack, while also delaying the damage-dealt until a specific time in the attack animation. Animation: `query.is_delayed_attacking`

attack_duration.description: The entity's attack animation will play out over this duration (in seconds). Also controls attack cooldown.

attack_once.description: Allows the entity to use this attack behavior, only once EVER.

attack_types.description: Defines the entity types this entity will attack.

hit_delay_pct.description: The percentage into the attack animation to apply the damage of the attack (1.0 = 100%).

inner_boundary_time_increase.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when the target is beyond the "path_inner_boundary".

max_path_time.description: Maximum base time (in seconds) to recalculate new attack path to target (before increases applied).

melee_fov.description: Field of view (in degrees) when using the sensing component to detect an attack target.

min_path_time.description: Minimum base time (in seconds) to recalculate new attack path to target (before increases applied).

on_attack.description: Defines the event to trigger when this entity successfully attacks.

outer_boundary_time_increase.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when the target is beyond the "path_outer_boundary".

path_fail_time_increase.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when this entity cannot move along the current path.

path_inner_boundary.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "inner_boundary_tick_increase".

path_outer_boundary.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "outer_boundary_tick_increase".

random_stop_interval.description: This entity will have a 1 in N chance to stop it's current attack, where N = "random_stop_interval".

reach_multiplier.description: Used with the base size of the entity to determine minimum target-distance before trying to deal attack damage.

require_complete_path.description: Toggles (on/off) the need to have a full path from the entity to the target when using this melee attack behavior.

set_persistent.description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player

speed_multiplier.description: This multiplier modifies the attacking entity's speed when moving toward the target.

track_target.description: Allows the entity to track the attack target, even if the entity has no sensing.

x_max_rotation.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

y_max_head_rotation.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.

minecraft:behavior.croak.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.croak.description: Allows the entity to croak at a random time interval with configurable conditions. Animation: `query.is_croaking`

duration.description: Random range in seconds after which the croaking stops. Can also be a constant.

filters.description: Conditions for the behavior to start and keep running. The interval between runs only starts after passing the filters.

interval.description: Random range in seconds between runs of this behavior. Can also be a constant.

minecraft:behavior.controlled_by_player.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.controlled_by_player.description: Allows the entity to be controlled by the player using an item in the item_controllable property (required). Also requires the minecraft:movement property, and the minecraft:rideable property. On every tick, the entity will attempt to rotate towards where the player is facing with the control item whilst simultaneously moving forward.

fractional_rotation.description: The entity will attempt to rotate to face where the player is facing each tick. The entity will target this percentage of their difference in their current facing angles each tick (from 0.0 to 1.0 where 1.0 = 100%). This is limited by FractionalRotationLimit. A value of 0.0 will result in the entity no longer turning to where the player is facing.

fractional_rotation_limit.description: The entity will attempt to rotate to face where the player is facing each tick. The entity will target this percentage of their difference in their current facing angles each tick (from 0.0 to 1.0 where 1.0 = 100%). This is limited by FractionalRotationLimit. A value of 0.0 will result in the entity no longer turning to where the player is facing.

mount_speed_multiplier.description: Speed multiplier of mount when controlled by player.

angle_change.description: Number of degrees to change this entity's facing by, when the entity selects its next anchor point.

goal_radius.description: Maximum distance from the anchor-point in which this entity considers itself to have reached the anchor point. This is to prevent the entity from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot.

height_above_target_range.description: The number of blocks above the target that the next anchor point can be set. This value is used only when the entity is tracking a target.

height_adjustment_chance.description: Percent chance to determine how often to increase or decrease the current height around the anchor point. 1 = 100%. "height_change_chance" is deprecated and has been replaced with "height_adjustment_chance".

height_offset_range.description: Vertical distance from the anchor point this entity must stay within, upon a successful height adjustment.

radius_adjustment_chance.description: Percent chance to determine how often to increase the size of the current movement radius around the anchor point. 1 = 100%. "radius_change_chance" is deprecated and has been replaced with "radius_adjustment_chance".

radius_change.description: The number of blocks to increase the current movement radius by, upon successful "radius_adjustment_chance". If the current radius increases over the range maximum, the current radius will be set back to the range minimum and the entity will change between clockwise and counter-clockwise movement..

radius_range.description: Horizontal distance from the anchor point this entity must stay within upon a successful radius adjustment.

speed_multiplier.description: Multiplies the speed at which this entity travels to its next desired position.

minecraft:behavior.charge_held_item.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.charge_held_item.description: Allows an entity to charge and use their held item.

items.description: The list of items that can be used to charge the held item. This list is required and must have at least one item in it.

minecraft:behavior.charge_attack.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.charge_attack.description: Allows this entity to damage a target by using a running attack.

max_distance.description: A charge attack cannot start if the entity is farther than this distance to the target.

min_distance.description: A charge attack cannot start if the entity is closer than this distance to the target.

speed_multiplier.description: Modifies the entity's speed when charging toward the target.

success_rate.description: Percent chance this entity will start a charge attack, if not already attacking (1.0 = 100%)

minecraft:behavior.celebrate_survive.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.celebrate_survive.description: Allows this entity to celebrate surviving a raid by shooting fireworks.

duration.description: The duration in seconds that the celebration lasts for.

fireworks_interval.description: The duration in seconds that the celebration lasts for.

on_celebration_end_event.description: The event to trigger when the goal's duration expires.

minecraft:behavior.dig.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.dig.description: Allows this entity to dig into the ground before despawning. Animation: `query.is_digging`

allow_dig_when_named.description: If true, this behavior can run when this entity is named. Otherwise not.

digs_in_daylight.description: Indicates that the actor should start digging when it sees daylight

idle_time.description: The minimum idle time in seconds between the last detected disturbance to the start of digging.

on_start.description: Event(s) to run when the goal starts.

suspicion_is_disturbance.description: If true, finding new suspicious locations count as disturbances that may delay the start of this goal.

vibration_is_disturbance.description: If true, vibrations count as disturbances that may delay the start of this goal.

minecraft:behavior.random_search_and_dig.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.random_search_and_dig.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Allows this entity to locate a random target block that it can path find to. Once found, the entity will move towards it and dig up an item. [Valid target block type: Dirt, Grass, Podzol, DirtWithRoots, MossBlock, Mud, MuddyMangroveRoots]. Animation: `query.is_searching`

find_valid_position_retries.description: Amount of retries to find a valid target position within search range.

goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the entity to considers it has reached it's target position.

item.description: The item to spawn on successful dig. Format: itemName:auxValue

on_searching_start.description: Event to run when the goal starts searching.

on_fail_during_searching.description: Event to run when the goal failed while in searching state.

on_digging_start.description: Event to run when the goal ends searching has begins digging.

on_item_found.description: Event to run when the goal find a item.

on_fail_during_digging.description: Event to run when the goal failed while in digging state.

on_success.description: Event to run when searching and digging has ended.

search_range_xz.description: Width and length of the volume around the entity used to find a valid target position

search_range_y.description: Height of the volume around the entity used to find a valid target position

spawn_item_after_seconds.description: Digging duration before spawning item in seconds.

spawn_item_pos_offset.description: Distance to offset the item's spawn location in the direction the mob is facing.

speed_multiplier.description: Searching movement speed multiplier.

minecraft:behavior.dragonchargeplayer.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.dragonchargeplayer.description: Allows this entity to attack a player by charging at them. The player is chosen by the "minecraft:behavior.dragonscanning". Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

active_speed.description: The speed this entity moves when this behavior has started or while it's active.

continue_charge_threshold_time.description: If the dragon is outside the "target_zone" for longer than "continue_charge_threshold_time" seconds, the charge is canceled.

flight_speed.description: The speed this entity moves while this behavior is not active.

target_zone.description: Minimum and maximum distance, from the target, this entity can use this behavior.

turn_speed.description: The speed at which this entity turns while using this behavior.

minecraft:behavior.dragonflaming.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.dragonflaming.description: Allows this entity to use a flame-breath attack. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

cooldown_time.description: Time (in seconds), after roar, to breath flame.

flame_time.description: Time (in seconds), after roar, to breath flame.

ground_flame_count.description: Time (in seconds), after roar, to breath flame.

roar_time.description: Time (in seconds) to roar, before breathing flame.

minecraft:behavior.dragonstrafeplayer.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.dragonstrafeplayer.description: Allows the Dragon to fly around in a circle around the center podium. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

minecraft:behavior.drink_milk.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.drink_milk.description: Allows the mob to drink milk based on specified environment conditions.

cooldown_seconds.description: Time (in seconds) that the goal is on cooldown before it can be used again.

filters.description: Conditions that need to be met for the behavior to start.

minecraft:behavior.eat_block.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.eat_block.description: Allows the entity to consume a block, replace the eaten block with another block, and trigger an event as a result. Animation: `query.is_eating`

eat_and_replace_block_pairs.description: A collection of pairs of blocks; the first ("eat_block")is the block the entity should eat, the second ("replace_block") is the block that should replace the eaten block.

on_eat.description: The event to trigger when the block eating animation has completed.

success_chance.description: A molang expression defining the success chance the entity has to consume a block.

time_until_eat.description: The amount of time (in seconds) it takes for the block to be eaten upon a successful eat attempt.

minecraft:behavior.eat_mob.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.eat_mob.description: Allows the entity to eat a specified Mob. Animation: `query.is_eating_mob`

eat_animation_time.description: Sets the time in seconds the eat animation should play for.

eat_mob_sound.description: Sets the sound that should play when eating a mob.

loot_table.description: The loot table for loot to be dropped when eating a mob.

pull_in_force.description: Sets the force which the mob-to-be-eaten is pulled towards the eating mob.

reach_mob_distance.description: Sets the desired distance to be reached before eating the mob.

run_speed.description: Sets the entity's speed when running toward the target.

minecraft:behavior.emerge.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.emerge.description: Allows this entity to emerge from the ground. Animation: `query.is_emerging`

cooldown_time.description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again

on_done.description: Trigger to be executed when the goal execution is about to end

minecraft:behavior.equip_item.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.equip_item.description: The entity puts on the desired equipment.

minecraft:behavior.fertilize_farm_block.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.fertilize_farm_block.description: Allows the mob to search within an area for a growable crop block. If found, the mob will use any available fertilizer in their inventory on the crop. This goal will not execute if the mob does not have a fertilizer item in its inventory.

goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached it's target position.

max_fertilizer_usage.description: The maximum number of times the mob will use fertilzer on the target block.

search_cooldown_max_seconds.description: The maximum number of times the mob will use fertilzer on the target block.

search_count.description: The number of randomly selected blocks each tick that the mob will check within its search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick.

search_height.description: The Height in blocks the mob will search within to find a valid target position.

search_range.description: The distance in blocks the mob will search within to find a valid target position.

speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this Goal.

minecraft:behavior.admire_item.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.admire_item.description: Enables the mob to admire items that have been configured as admirable. Must be used in combination with the admire_item component. Animation: `query.is_admiring`

admire_item_sound.description: The sound event to play when admiring the item

sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.

minecraft:behavior.barter.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.barter.description: Enables the mob to barter for items that have been configured as barter currency. Must be used in combination with the barter component

minecraft:behavior.beg.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.beg.description: Allows this mob to look at and follow the player that holds food they like.

items.description: List of items that this mob likes

look_distance.description: Distance in blocks the mob will beg from

look_time.description: The range of time in seconds this mob will stare at the player holding a food they like, begging for it

minecraft:behavior.break_door.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.break_door.description: Allows this mob to break doors.

minecraft:behavior.breed.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.breed.description: Allows this mob to breed with other mobs.

speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

minecraft:behavior.celebrate.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.celebrate.description: This allows the mob celebrate by jumping up and playing a sound periodically. Animation `query.is_celebrating`

duration.description: The duration of the celebration (in seconds).

jump_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before jumping again.

on_celebration_end_event.description: The event to trigger when the goal's duration expires.

sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.

minecraft:behavior.defend_trusted_target.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.defend_trusted_target.description: Allows the mob to target another mob that hurts an entity it trusts.

aggro_sound.description: Sound to occasionally play while defending.

entity_types.description: List of entity types that this mob considers valid targets

filters.description: Conditions that make this entry in the list valid

max_dist.description: Maximum distance this mob can be away to be a valid choice

must_see.description: If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice

must_see_forget_duration.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more

sprint_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the running speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

walk_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

must_see.description: If true, only entities in this mob's viewing range can be selected as targets

must_see_forget_duration.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more

within_radius.description: Distance in blocks that the target can be within to launch an attack

minecraft:behavior.door_interact.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.door_interact.description: Allows the mob to open and close doors.

minecraft:behavior.dragondeath.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.dragondeath.description: Allows the dragon to go out with glory. This controls the Ender Dragon's death animation and can't be used by other mobs.

minecraft:behavior.dragonholdingpattern.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.dragonholdingpattern.description: Allows the Dragon to fly around in a circle around the center podium. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

minecraft:behavior.dragonscanning.description: Allows the dragon to look around for a player to attack while in perch mode. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

minecraft:behavior.dragontakeoff.description: Allows the dragon to leave perch mode and go back to flying around. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

minecraft:behavior.drink_potion.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.drink_potion.description: Allows the mob to drink potions based on specified environment conditions.

potions.description: A list of potions that this entity can drink. Each potion entry has the following parameters:

chance.description: The percent chance (from 0.0 to 1.0) of this potion being selected when searching for a potion to use.

filters.description: The filters to use when determining if this potion can be selected.

id.description: The registry ID of the potion to use

speed_modifier.description: The movement speed modifier to apply to the entity while it is drinking a potion. A value of 0 represents no change in speed.

minecraft:behavior.eat_carried_item.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.eat_carried_item.description: If the mob is carrying a food item, the mob will eat it and the effects will be applied to the mob.

delay_before_eating.description: Time in seconds the mob should wait before eating the item.

minecraft:behavior.enderman_take_block.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.enderman_take_block.description: Allows the enderman to take a block and carry it around. Can only be used by Endermen. Animation: `query.is_carrying_block`

minecraft:behavior.explore_outskirts.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.explore_outskirts.description: allows a mob to explore the outskirts of a village

next_xz.description: A new explore point will randomly be chosen within this XZ distance of the current target position when navigation has finished and the wait timer has elapsed.

next_y.description: A new explore point will randomly be chosen within this Y distance of the current target position when navigation has finished and the wait timer has elapsed.

min_wait_time.description: The wait time in seconds between choosing new explore points will be chosen on a random interval between this value and the maximum wait time.

max_wait_time.description: The wait time in seconds between choosing new explore points will be chosen on a random interval between this value and the minimum wait time. This value is also the total amount of time the entity will explore random points before the goal stops.

max_travel_time.description: This is the maximum amount of time an entity will attempt to reach it's travel point on the outskirts of the village before the goal exits.

min_perimeter.description: The minimum perimeter of the village required to run this goal.

min_dist_from_target.description: The entity must be within this distance for it to consider it has successfully reached its target.

timer_ratio.description: Each new explore point will be chosen on a random interval between the minimum and the maximum wait time, divided by this value. This does not apply to the first explore point chosen when the goal runs.

dist_from_boundary.description: The distance from the boundary the villager must be within in to explore the outskirts.

explore_dist.description: The distance in which the mob will proceed past the village bounds

speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

wait_time.description: The time the mob will stand around 'searching' for POIs

minecraft:behavior.find_cover.description: Allows the mob to seek shade.

cooldown_time.description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again

speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

minecraft:behavior.find_mount.description: Allows the mob to look around for another mob to ride atop it.

avoid_water.description: If true, the mob will not go into water blocks when going towards a mount

mount_distance.description: This is the distance the mob needs to be, in blocks, from the desired mount to mount it. If the value is below 0, the mob will use its default attack distance

start_delay.description: Time the mob will wait before starting to move towards the mount

target_needed.description: If true, the mob will only look for a mount if it has a target

within_radius.description: Distance in blocks within which the mob will look for a mount

minecraft:behavior.find_underwater_treas.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.find_underwater_treas.description: Allows the mob to move towards the nearest underwater ruin or shipwreck.

speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

stop_distance.description: The distance the mob will move before stopping.

minecraft:behavior.flee_sun.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.flee_sun.description: Allows the mob to run away from direct sunlight and seek shade.

minecraft:behavior.float_wander.title: AI GOAL

must_reach.description: If true, the point has to be reachable to be a valid target

random_reselect.description: If true, the mob will randomly pick a new point while moving to the previously selected one

xz_dist.description: Distance in blocks on ground that the mob will look for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1

must_see_forget_duration.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more

must_see_forget_duration.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more

mob_detect_height.description: The block distance in y that will be checked for mobs that this mob detects

minecraft:behavior.nearest_attackable_ta.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.nearest_attackable_ta.description: Allows an entity to attack the closest target within a given subset of specific target types.

attack_interval.description: Time range (in seconds) between searching for an attack target, range is in (0, "attack_interval"]. Only used if "attack_interval" is greater than 0, otherwise "scan_interval" is used.

attack_interval_min.description: Alias for "attack_interval"; provides the same functionality as "attack_interval".

attack_owner.description: If true, this entity can attack its owner.

entity_types.description: Filters which types of targets are valid for this entity.

filters.description: Conditions that make this target a valid type.

max_dist.description: To be a valid target choice, the target type cannot be farther away from this entity than "max_dist".

must_see.description: Determines if target-validity requires this entity to be in range only, or both in range and in sight.

must_see_forget_duration.description: Time (in seconds) the target must not be seen by this entity to become invalid. Used only if "must_see" is true.

must_reach.description: If true, this entity requires a path to the target.

must_see.description: Determines if target-validity requires this entity to be in range only, or both in range and in sight.

must_see_forget_duration.description: Time (in seconds) the target must not be seen by this entity to become invalid. Used only if "must_see" is true.

persist_time.description: Time (in seconds) this entity can continue attacking the target after the target is no longer valid.

reselect_targets.description: Allows the attacking entity to update the nearest target, otherwise a target is only reselected after each "scan_interval" or "attack_interval".

scan_interval.description: If "attack_interval" is 0 or isn't declared, then between attacks: scanning for a new target occurs every amount of ticks equal to "scan_interval", minimum value is 1. Values under 10 can affect performance.

set_persistent.description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player

target_invisible_multiplier.description: Multiplied with the target's armor coverage percentage to modify "max_dist" when detecting an invisible target.

target_search_height.description: Maximum vertical target-search distance, if it's greater than the target type's "max_dist". A negative value defaults to "entity_types" greatest "max_dist".

target_sneak_visibility_multiplier.description: Multiplied with the target type's "max_dist" when trying to detect a sneaking target.

must_see.description: If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice

must_see_forget_duration.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more

sprint_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the running speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

walk_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

minecraft:behavior.work.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.work.description: allows the NPC to use their jobsite POI

active_time.description: The amount of ticks the NPC will stay in their the work location

can_work_in_rain.description: If true, this entity can work when their jobsite POI is being rained on.

goal_cooldown.description: The amount of ticks the goal will be on cooldown before it can be used again

on_arrival.description: Event to run when the mob reaches their jobsite and finishes working.

sound_delay_max.description: The max interval in which a sound will play

sound_delay_min.description: The min interval in which a sound will play

speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

work_in_rain_tolerance.description: If "can_work_in_rain" is false, this is the maximum number of ticks left in the goal where rain will not interrupt the goal

minecraft:behavior.move_towards_home_res.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.move_towards_home_res.description: Allows mobs with the home component to move toward their pre-defined area that the mob should be restricted to.

speed_multiplier.description: This multiplier modifies the entity's speed when moving towards it's restriction.

minecraft:behavior.ranged_attack.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.ranged_attack.description: Allows an entity to attack by using ranged shots. "charge_shoot_trigger" must be greater than 0 to enable charged up burst-shot attacks. Requires minecraft:shooter to define projectile behaviour. Animation: `query.facing_target_to_range_attack`

attack_interval.description: Alternative to "attack_interval_min" & "attack_interval_max". Consistent reload-time (in seconds), when not using a charged shot. Does not scale with target-distance.

attack_interval_max.description: Maximum bound for reload-time range (in seconds), when not using a charged shot. Reload-time range scales with target-distance.

attack_interval_min.description: Minimum bound for reload-time range (in seconds), when not using a charged shot. Reload-time range scales with target-distance.

attack_radius.description: Minimum distance to target before this entity will attempt to shoot.

attack_radius_min.description: Minimum distance the target can be for this mob to fire. If the target is closer, this mob will move first before firing

burst_interval.description: Time (in seconds) between each individual shot when firing a burst of shots from a charged up attack.

burst_shots.description: Number of shots fired every time the attacking entity uses a charged up attack.

charge_charged_trigger.description: Time (in seconds, then add "charge_shoot_trigger"), before a charged up attack is done charging. Charge-time decays while target is not in sight.

charge_shoot_trigger.description: Amount of time (in seconds, then doubled) a charged shot must be charging before reloading burst shots. Charge-time decays while target is not in sight.

ranged_fov.description: Field of view (in degrees) when using sensing to detect a target for attack.

set_persistent.description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player

speed_multiplier.description: During attack behavior, this multiplier modifies the entity's speed when moving toward the target.

swing.description: If a swing animation (using variable.attack_time) exists, this causes the actor to swing their arm(s) upon firing the ranged attack.

target_in_sight_time.description: Minimum amount of time (in seconds) the attacking entity needs to see the target before moving toward it.

x_max_rotation.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

y_max_head_rotation.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.

minecraft:behavior.timer_flag_1.title: AI GOAL
minecraft:behavior.timer_flag_1.description: Fires an event when this behavior starts, then waits for a duration before stopping. When stopping due to that timeout or due to being interrupted by another behavior, fires another event. query.timer_flag_1 will return 1.0 on both the client and server when this behavior is running, and 0.0 otherwise. Animation: `query.timer_flag_1`

on_end.description: Event(s) to run when the goal end.

on_start.description: Event(s) to run when the goal starts.

events.description: A mapping to all events used by this entity.

add.description: Adds component groups to the current entity. These groups must be defined in the 'component_groups' section of the file. As entities can only have one component of each type active, any components in a group that is being added will replace previously added components. Additionally, adding a component group that is already active will cause those components to be re-initialized. For some types of components like minecraft:is_baby, re-initializing an already active component has no effect, but for other component types the associated logic will start over. For example, an already-added minecraft:timer that is added again will start its timing logic over.

remove.description: Removes component groups from the current entity. This can be any group you have defined in the 'component_groups' section of the file.

trigger.description: Triggers additional entity events when hit. For example, you could use a randomize node in minecraft:entity_spawned to choose either an adult or baby event for adding component groups.

randomize.description: The 'randomize' node is an array node that will pick one entry to execute, based on a weight. If no weight is specified, a node will have a weight of 1.0. If you add a weight of 4.0 in one node, and 8.0 in another, then those nodes will have a 33.33% (4 / (4 + 8)) and 66.66% (8 / (4 + 8)) chance of executing, respectively.
